mapper.insert: insert into news_article (articleTitle, articleWriter, articleContents, fileAttached, reporterId) values(#{articleTitle},#{articleWriter},#{articleContents},#{fileAttached},#{reporterId})
insert into news_article_picture(originalFileName, storedFileName, articleId) values(#{originalFileName}, #{storedFileName},#{articleId})
mapper.select: select*from news_article order by id desc limit #{start}, #{limit}
select count(id) from news_article where ${type} concat('%',#{q},'%')
select*from news_article where ${type} like concat('%',#{q},'%') order by id desc limit #{start}, #{limit}
